title: daxkie
author: daxkie
created_time: June 05, 2022, 08:18:13 AMLast edit: June 05, 2022, 08:33:00 AM by daxkie
content: Here you have the roles of the Ambassadors. ðŸ‘‡ðŸ‘‡Leader or Country Leader- Organize AMA's, events- Zoom in promoting the currency- Recruit new Ambassadors Content Creators- Creation of Videos / Graphics to put on different social media. Tutorials, educational videos- Write blogs, articles- Meme creationTranslator- Unofficial translations of documents, videos, guides. Any languageSocial Media Engagement / Influencer-Share information about the project on social networks and groups (on the social networks we decide). in personal account-Crypto Influencers who are part of crypto communities in the most diverse social media-Create engagement contentCommunity Partner-(This is for anyone who owns a community, groups, etc.)Promote the Token in our community and we can promote it too or give out rewards.Community moderators and Shillers-Any country Send me a message on telegram @bikitrumpTHANK YOU!

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: From what i can see in your post history you were inactive since last January when you were just a bounty hunter working with your mainly in Twitter campaign.Now you are looking for ambassadors for an unknown project. I think you have to provide more info about what are you about to promote Bro .

comments.author: sedinvore
comments.body: Well, If you are really serious about hiring people you may search in the Fiverr Marketplace.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: It did make a lot of sense if you can take out a little bit of time more to explain what the project is all about, this will help one decide whether they really have to pm you on telegram or not.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 05, 2022, 07:17:06 PMIt did make a lot of sense if you can take out a little bit of time more to explain what the project is all about, this will help one decide whether they really have to pm you on telegram or not. Probably another scam token. They will pay you with "tokens" and give you a small stake in a worthless project.Any serious token project would be posting ads on hiring platforms. Save your time, don't even bother contacting them.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: If you're for real, it will be well encouraging should you take more time to throw more light about this said project of yours.No one would wanna jump I to a stuff he doesn't have clear understanding of, except for gullibles.
